entry.title: Coloring Page Generators
entry.summary:
A crossover between creative coding and drawing, two of my favourite things to do. These coloring page generators combine drawings of parts of the image in a unique, random way to generate a new coloring page every time.

  • If you like space, this space station generator is your thing
  • Or …
entry.content:
A crossover between creative coding and drawing, two of my favourite things to do. These coloring page generators combine drawings of parts of the image in a unique, random way to generate a new coloring page every time.

  • If you like space, this space station generator is your thing
  • Or if you're into an underground adventure, check out this caves and tunnels generator!

entry.title: Django Day Copenhagen 2020
entry.summary: This was my first ever assignment and it went so well I want to do more of them. I learned a lot during such a short period. I got better at digitizing my work and coloring svgs. There was a lot of communication back and forth via Email, but Django …
entry.content:
This was my first ever assignment and it went so well I want to do more of them. I learned a lot during such a short period. I got better at digitizing my work and coloring svgs. There was a lot of communication back and forth via Email, but Django Denmark was such a lovely organization to work together with.

Thank you for the lovely collaboration, for your inspiration and your friendly feedback.
